title: Sunday special roast beef
ingredients: ['1.5 kg (3 lb 3oz) boned, rolled and tied lean sirloin of beef, trimmed of fat', '4 tsp made English mustard (optional)', '450 ml (15 fl oz) beef stock, preferably home-made', 'salt and pepper', 'Yorkshire puddings', '50 g (1¾ oz) plain flour', '1 egg', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '2 tsp sunflower oil', 'Roast vegetables', '1.35 kg (3 lb) floury potatoes, peeled and cut into even-sized pieces', '675g (1½ lb) baby parsnips, halved lengthways', '675g (1½ lb) baby carrots, halved lengthways', '3 tbsp sunflower oil', '675g (1½ lb) broccoli florets']
